description:
Shield your lawn from summer stress

Defend your lawn against summer's scorching heat and dry spells with our Summer Heat & Drought Defense Kit.

As temperatures rise, so does the stress on your lawn. Our kit features Lawn Aid and Drought Defense lawn treatments, specifically formulated to enhance your lawn's resistance to heat and drought stress. Infused with potassium and seaweed extract, these solutions not only increase heat tolerance but also promote efficient water use and root strength, ensuring your lawn stays strong all summer long.

Consciously formulated without pesticides and harmful ingredients, Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's unique challenges.

sections.kit_benefits:
Drought stress resistance by improving soil water distribution
Promotes water penetration in tough soils for deep rooting grass

Zero pesticides made without harsh chemicals
Made for any lawn especially lawns in hot and dry regions
User-friendly easy to use and apply safely
Up to 5,000 sq. ft. of coverage for small to medium-sized yards
sections.whats_included:
2 Drought Defense Liquid Lawn Treatment: 0-0-1 NPK lawn formula to enhance drought resilience and water efficiency. Covers up to 2,500 sq. ft. per pouch.
1 Lawn Aid Heat Stress Prevention Treatment: A 0-0-3 NPK lawn formula to mitigate heat stress. Covers up to 3,000 sq. ft. or spot treatment as needed.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Apply Drought Defense. Attach the sprayer to the pouch and hose. Apply according to the recommended rate for your lawn size. Let it dry fully for 4-24 hours.
Apply Lawn Aid. Attach the sprayer to the pouch and hose. Apply as a spot treatment to problem areas of the lawn. Let it dry fully.
After 4-6 weeks, apply Drought Defense. Let it dry fully.
If you have any leftover product, reapply Lawn Aid and Drought Defense every 4-6 weeks until the pouches are emptied. Save the sprayer for future use.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Ideally, apply this kit before high heat and drought conditions set in. For best results, apply in the early morning or evening when temperatures range between 50-85 degrees F. This will allow the products to be most effective.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes. This kit is designed to complement Sunday lawn and garden products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid product applications for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It’s safe for people and pets to return to the lawn once products dry.
When will I see results?
Typically, fertilizers offer 4-6 weeks of growth and results are visible within hours to days. Weed control results can be visible in a few hours to a few days.
